name: mm_user
description: marketmind's web service for managing users

scripts.fastapi: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run PostDescriptionModel" "npm run image_gen"   "npm run PostingTimeModel"
scripts.start: npm run reqinstall && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail  "npm run node" "npm run fastapi"
scripts.reqinstall: npm run install:PostDescriptionModel && npm run install:ImageModel && npm run install:PostingTimeModel
scripts.install:PostDescriptionModel: cd model_api/PostDescriptionModel && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:ImageModel: cd model_api/ImageModel && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:PostingTimeModel: cd model_api/PostingTimeModel && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
